sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

We are Sofia Guide Restaurants

The idea of the site is to show people`s favorite places for eat.
Every user can see the list of all uploaded restaurants and can search specific type in our search page.
If you want to have access to all functionality of the application, there is Register button in the header.
After successful register, the logged user can add restaurants in the site and also can write comments below every restaurant.
